Hi. I'm going to give this a try and hope it dosent screw up youre story.

As the Black Bird soars a signal rings in youre head.

Computer voice:(not youres by the way) Emergency in need of assistance
digging out unit from quadrant sectro 3002.





>-=SUDIE=-
>
>   A pod comes crashing down to Earth.  It hits around Moscow, Russia
>would be is the present day.  The Pod says, "Beast Mode Selected."
>The pod slowly opens and a Black Bird flys towards the sky and looks
>around.
>
>   "Hmmm. I wonder why this planet is a punishment?  What is that down
>there?"  Looks and sees a fox chasing a rabbit and starts to fly after
>the fox.
